name: Hentai Girl Karen
description: <h3>Introduction</h3>Hentai Girl Karen is a puzzle game,you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures.<br/>The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.<br/>There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.<h3>Characteristics</h3><ul><li>Cheat Mode (F)</li></ul><ul><li>The gallery can be operated with one hand</li></ul><ul><li>100 achievements worthy of being collectible</li></ul><h3>Tradingcards & Background</h3><br/><br/><br/>
